manifest.title: Rideshare Platform (Uber-style)
manifest.summary: Curated Marketplace and Mobility blueprint demonstrating architecture, org design, goals, and a rolling 3-year plan.

promptPack.seedPrompt: Design an inspired-by Rideshare Platform (Uber-style) system for Scale-up stage in the Marketplace and Mobility domain. Return strict JSON only using the SMT system schema with teams, services, goals, yearlyInitiatives, workPackages, and capacityConfiguration for a rolling 3-year roadmap.

variants.name: MVP
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Rideshare Platform (Uber-style) system for Scale-up stage in the Marketplace and Mobility domain. Optimize for MVP launch with lean team topology, foundational services, and Year 1 delivery focus.

variants.name: Scale
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Rideshare Platform (Uber-style) system for Scale-up stage in the Marketplace and Mobility domain. Optimize for scale with regional reliability goals, capacity growth, and cross-team dependency planning.

variants.name: Enterprise
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Rideshare Platform (Uber-style) system for Scale-up stage in the Marketplace and Mobility domain. Optimize for enterprise governance, compliance, multi-team execution, and roadmap risk controls.

promptPack.authorNotes: Use these prompts to regenerate or remix. Keep IDs stable and ensure initiative-goal-work-package linkage completeness.

learningOutcomes: Understand service and team decomposition for this domain.
Inspect goal-to-initiative traceability over a 3-year horizon.
Analyze capacity and dependency tradeoffs before roadmap commitments.

variants.name: MVP

promptPack.authorNotes: Use these prompts to regenerate or remix. Keep IDs stable and ensure initiative-goal-work-package linkage completeness.

manifest.title: Digital Wallet Platform (PayPal-style)
manifest.summary: Curated Fintech blueprint demonstrating architecture, org design, goals, and a rolling 3-year plan.

promptPack.seedPrompt: Design an inspired-by Digital Wallet Platform (PayPal-style) system for Growth stage in the Fintech domain. Return strict JSON only using the SMT system schema with teams, services, goals, yearlyInitiatives, workPackages, and capacityConfiguration for a rolling 3-year roadmap.

variants.name: MVP
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Digital Wallet Platform (PayPal-style) system for Growth stage in the Fintech domain. Optimize for MVP launch with lean team topology, foundational services, and Year 1 delivery focus.

variants.name: Scale
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Digital Wallet Platform (PayPal-style) system for Growth stage in the Fintech domain. Optimize for scale with regional reliability goals, capacity growth, and cross-team dependency planning.

variants.name: Enterprise
variants.prompt: Design an inspired-by Digital Wallet Platform (PayPal-style) system for Growth stage in the Fintech domain. Optimize for enterprise governance, compliance, multi-team execution, and roadmap risk controls.

promptPack.authorNotes: Use these prompts to regenerate or remix. Keep IDs stable and ensure initiative-goal-work-package linkage completeness.

learningOutcomes: Understand service and team decomposition for this domain.
Inspect goal-to-initiative traceability over a 3-year horizon.
Analyze capacity and dependency tradeoffs before roadmap commitments.

system.systemDescription: Curated Fintech blueprint demonstrating architecture, org design, goals, and a rolling 3-year plan.
